title: The Mentor You Didn't Ask For
description: Some lessons are only learned in the face of adversity. In “The Mentor You Didn’t Ask For,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that even during the painful seasons of life, God has a plan for you.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Some lessons are only learned in the face of adversity. In “The Mentor You Didn’t Ask For,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that even during the painful seasons of life, God has a plan for you.
